Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer should probably stay in place. I bring this up because my eWeek colleague, Don Reisinger, just published an article titled, href="http://www.eweek.com/c/a/Enterprise-Applications/Steve Ballmer-Steve Ballmers-CES-Performance-Proves-He-Needs-to-Go-10-Reasons-Why-712672/"> Steve Ballmer 's CES Performance Proves He Needs to Go. Among the reasons: Microsoft's failure to craft a sizable tablet response to the Apple iPad, Steve Ballmer 's supposedly misplaced faith in Windows Phone 7's market prospects and little progress in reversing Google's search-engine dominance
